text: {{Infobox writer | name = Cahit Sıtkı Tarancı | image = | imagesize = | caption = | pseudonym = | birth_date = | birth_place = Diyarbakır, Turkey | death_date = | death_place = Vienna, Austria | occupation = Novelist, Interpreter | nationality = Turkish | period = | genre = | subject = | movement = Garip | notableworks = | influences = | influenced = | spouse = | website = }} Cahit Sıtkı Tarancı (4 October 1910 Diyarbakır – 12 October 1956 Vienna) was a Turkish poet, writer and interpreter.
